participant_1.name: Avery
participant_1.personality: Creative, outgoing, and artistic. Loves expressing herself through various forms of art.
participant_1.background: I like to dye my hair a variety of colors to fit my creative personality. My dog is my best friend, so I'd love to have lunch with him and learn some new tricks to teach him. I am an army ranger. I like to create art. My nickname is bubblegum.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and introspective. Enjoys music and seeks to improve personal health and well-being.
participant_2.background: I want to learn how to cook more healthy meals because I know fast food isn't good for my health. I take Fridays off in the summer. I like to listen to music. My favorite band is Radiohead. I wish I could be the kind of person my parents want me to be.

content.text: Hey! Not much, just relaxing at home. What about you?
Same here! I'm just hanging out with my dog, Rocky. He's my best friend.
Aww, dogs are the best! I wish I had one.
You should get one! They're so much fun and they're always there for you.
I know, I know. I've been thinking about it for a while.
Well, if you ever decide to get one, I can give you some tips on how to pick the right one.
No problem! So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to listen to music, read, and go for walks.
Me too! I love music and reading. I'm not much of a walker, though.
Oh, really? What kind of music do you like?
I like all kinds of music, but I mostly listen to alternative rock and indie music.
Nice! I like alternative rock too. My favorite band is Radiohead.
Oh, cool! I love Radiohead! They're one of my favorite bands too.
Awesome! We should listen to them together sometime.
